verses.text_plain: How is the gold become dim! how is the most fine gold changed! the stones of the sanctuary are poured out in the top of every street.
verses.verse_html: 1How is the gold become dim! how is the most fine gold changed! the stones of the sanctuary are poured out in the top of every street.

verses.text_plain: The precious sons of Zion, comparable to fine gold, how are they esteemed as earthen pitchers, the work of the hands of the potter!
verses.verse_html: 2The precious sons of Zion, comparable to fine gold, how are they esteemed as earthen pitchers, the work of the hands of the potter!

verses.text_plain: Even the sea monsters draw out the breast, they give suck to their young ones: the daughter of my people is become cruel, like the ostriches in the wilderness.
verses.verse_html:
3Even the sea monsters draw out the breast, they give suck to their young ones: the daughter of my people is become cruel, like the ostriches in the wilderness. ▼
▼ sea…: or, sea calves

footnotes.body_html: ▼ sea…: or, sea calves

verses.text_plain: The tongue of the sucking child cleaveth to the roof of his mouth for thirst: the young children ask bread, and no man breaketh it unto them.
verses.verse_html: 4The tongue of the sucking child cleaveth to the roof of his mouth for thirst: the young children ask bread, and no man breaketh it unto them.

tokens.text: to the roof of his mouth

verses.text_plain: They that did feed delicately are desolate in the streets: they that were brought up in scarlet embrace dunghills.
verses.verse_html: 5They that did feed delicately are desolate in the streets: they that were brought up in scarlet embrace dunghills.

verses.text_plain: For the punishment of the iniquity of the daughter of my people is greater than the punishment of the sin of Sodom, that was overthrown as in a moment, and no hands stayed on her.
verses.verse_html:
6For the punishment of the iniquity of the daughter of my people is greater than the punishment of the sin of Sodom, that was overthrown as in a moment, and no hands stayed on her. ▼
▼ punishment of the iniquity: or, iniquity

tokens.text: For the punishment of the iniquity

footnotes.body_text: ▼ punishment of the iniquity: or, iniquity
footnotes.body_html: ▼ punishment of the iniquity: or, iniquity

verses.text_plain: Her Nazarites were purer than snow, they were whiter than milk, they were more ruddy in body than rubies, their polishing was of sapphire:
verses.verse_html: 7Her Nazarites were purer than snow, they were whiter than milk, they were more ruddy in body than rubies, their polishing was of sapphire:

verses.text_plain: Their visage is blacker than a coal; they are not known in the streets: their skin cleaveth to their bones; it is withered, it is become like a stick.
verses.verse_html:
8Their visage is blacker than a coal; they are not known in the streets: their skin cleaveth to their bones; it is withered, it is become like a stick. ▼
▼ blacker…: Heb. darker than blackness

tokens.text: it is become like a stick

footnotes.body_html: ▼ blacker…: Heb. darker than blackness

verses.text_plain: They that be slain with the sword are better than they that be slain with hunger: for these pine away, stricken through for want of the fruits of the field.
verses.verse_html:
9They that be slain with the sword are better than they that be slain with hunger: for these pine away, stricken through for want of the fruits of the field. ▼
▼ pine…: Heb. flow out

footnotes.body_html: ▼ pine…: Heb. flow out

verses.text_plain: The hands of the pitiful women have sodden their own children: they were their meat in the destruction of the daughter of my people.
verses.verse_html: 10The hands of the pitiful women have sodden their own children: they were their meat in the destruction of the daughter of my people.

verses.text_plain: The Lord hath accomplished his fury; he hath poured out his fierce anger, and hath kindled a fire in Zion, and it hath devoured the foundations thereof.
verses.verse_html: 11The Lord hath accomplished his fury; he hath poured out his fierce anger, and hath kindled a fire in Zion, and it hath devoured the foundations thereof.

verses.text_plain: The kings of the earth, and all the inhabitants of the world, would not have believed that the adversary and the enemy should have entered into the gates of Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html: 12The kings of the earth, and all the inhabitants of the world, would not have believed that the adversary and the enemy should have entered into the gates of Jerusalem.

verses.text_plain: For the sins of her prophets, and the iniquities of her priests, that have shed the blood of the just in the midst of her,
verses.verse_html: 13For the sins of her prophets, and the iniquities of her priests, that have shed the blood of the just in the midst of her,

verses.text_plain: They have wandered as blind men in the streets, they have polluted themselves with blood, so that men could not touch their garments.
verses.verse_html:
14They have wandered as blind men in the streets, they have polluted themselves with blood, so that men could not touch their garments. ▼
▼ so…: or, in that they could not but touch

footnotes.body_text: ▼ so…: or, in that they could not but touch
footnotes.body_html: ▼ so…: or, in that they could not but touch

verses.text_plain: They cried unto them, Depart ye; it is unclean; depart, depart, touch not: when they fled away and wandered, they said among the heathen, They shall no more sojourn there.
verses.verse_html:
15They cried unto them, Depart ye; it is unclean; depart, depart, touch not: when they fled away and wandered, they said among the heathen, They shall no more sojourn there. ▼
▼ it…: or, ye polluted

footnotes.body_html: ▼ it…: or, ye polluted

verses.text_plain: The anger of the Lord hath divided them; he will no more regard them: they respected not the persons of the priests, they favoured not the elders.
verses.verse_html:
16The anger of the Lord hath divided them; he will no more regard them: they respected not the persons of the priests, they favoured not the elders. ▼
▼ anger: or, face

verses.text_plain: As for us, our eyes as yet failed for our vain help: in our watching we have watched for a nation that could not save us.
verses.verse_html: 17As for us, our eyes as yet failed for our vain help: in our watching we have watched for a nation that could not save us.

verses.text_plain: They hunt our steps, that we cannot go in our streets: our end is near, our days are fulfilled; for our end is come.
verses.verse_html: 18They hunt our steps, that we cannot go in our streets: our end is near, our days are fulfilled; for our end is come.

verses.text_plain: Our persecutors are swifter than the eagles of the heaven: they pursued us upon the mountains, they laid wait for us in the wilderness.
verses.verse_html: 19Our persecutors are swifter than the eagles of the heaven: they pursued us upon the mountains, they laid wait for us in the wilderness.

verses.text_plain: The breath of our nostrils, the anointed of the Lord, was taken in their pits, of whom we said, Under his shadow we shall live among the heathen.
verses.verse_html: 20The breath of our nostrils, the anointed of the Lord, was taken in their pits, of whom we said, Under his shadow we shall live among the heathen.

verses.text_plain: Rejoice and be glad, O daughter of Edom, that dwellest in the land of Uz; the cup also shall pass through unto thee: thou shalt be drunken, and shalt make thyself naked.
verses.verse_html: 21Rejoice and be glad, O daughter of Edom, that dwellest in the land of Uz; the cup also shall pass through unto thee: thou shalt be drunken, and shalt make thyself naked.

tokens.text: through unto thee: thou shalt be drunken

verses.text_plain: The punishment of thine iniquity is accomplished, O daughter of Zion; he will no more carry thee away into captivity: he will visit thine iniquity, O daughter of Edom; he will discover thy sins.
verses.verse_html:
22The punishment of thine iniquity is accomplished, O daughter of Zion; he will no more carry thee away into captivity: he will visit thine iniquity, O daughter of Edom; he will discover thy sins. ▼
▼ The…: or, Thine iniquity
 , ▼
▼ discover…: or, carry thee captive for thy sins

footnotes.body_html: ▼ The…: or, Thine iniquity

footnotes.body_text: ▼ discover…: or, carry thee captive for thy sins
footnotes.body_html: ▼ discover…: or, carry thee captive for thy sins
